title: blocks
description: JSON schema for BigQuery table blocks

timestamp.description: The timestamp for when the block was collated

sha3_uncles.description: SHA3 of the uncles data in the block

logs_bloom.description: The bloom filter for the logs of the block

transactions_root.description: The root of the transaction trie of the block

state_root.description: The root of the final state trie of the block

receipts_root.description: The root of the receipts trie of the block

miner.description: The address of the beneficiary to whom the mining rewards were given

difficulty.description: Integer of the difficulty for this block

total_difficulty.description: Integer of the total difficulty of the chain until this block

size.description: The size of this block in bytes

extra_data.description: The extra data field of this block

gas_limit.description: The maximum gas allowed in this block

gas_used.description: The total used gas by all transactions in this block

transaction_count.description: The number of transactions in the block
